sentences.sContent: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.sContent: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.sContent_eng: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.sCn: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

sentences.sContent: When the shuttlecock was hit to and fro with a racket across a net, thegame was badminton.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the shuttlecock was hit to and fro with a racket across a net, thegame was badminton.
sentences.sCn: 双方用球拍拍打毽子使它来来往往的越过网前，这种游戏就是羽毛球。

trans.tranOther: a game that is similar to tennis but played with a  shuttlecock (=  small feathered object  )  instead of a ball
